name: CirrhosisICD9CM
title: Cirrhosis ICD9CM
description: This value set is currently undergoing testing. Use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains diagnoses consistent with cirrhosis of the liver, regardless of morphology, histology or etiology.),(Data Element Scope: This value set intends to identify patients diagnosed with cirrhosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Diagnoses consistent with cirrhosis of the liver, regardless of morphology, histology or etiology, as represented by select descendants of 571 | Chronic liver disease and cirrhosis.),(Exclusion Criteria: Descendants of 571 | Chronic liver disease and cirrhosis not representative or referencing cirrhotic liver disease, along with non-cirrhotic liver diseases)

concept.display: Cirrhosis of liver without mention of alcohol

contains.display: Cirrhosis of liver without mention of alcohol
